reviewText: Great Play.... It touched basis on events happening every day in marriage with a comedy touch. I was sitting at the edge of my seat the entire time anticipating the next move. Definitely a GETTER you won't be disappointed. I wasnt!

This is a great stage play from beginning to end. I loved it. The characters were full of energy. Shaneisha Dodson did an awesome job for this to be her first play. I'm excited to see her future works.
Poor Quality Taping! Save Your Money! SAD!
the video is boring and not very interesting in my opinion.

I am a person that really does not like to watch stage plays on DVD. I usually get bored with them and rarely finish watching them. But this plays was different. Each and every scene made me curious and kept me engaged. I actually felt like I was in the audience. This play is full of valuable life lessons, and I promise that you will find bits and piece of people that you personally know in many of the characters. This play is worth checking out, I guarantee you that you will not be disappointed. I will be looking for the next play from S. Dodson.

This play is amazing.  I have had the privilege of seeing it twice when it came to the East Coast and the cast was magnificent.  It brings light to friendships, relationships and commitment.  You will laugh all the way through.  Ms . Dodson did an awesome job with the writing of the play which if you read the book does not deviate at all.  I look forward to seeing more of her productions.
This play is entertaining, fun full of drama just what I like to see very well scripted seen the play live several times now I'm buying the Dvd it is for sure a must buy I highly recommend!

You think you know what will happen in this play but you don't! It is surprising, fresh, and funny. It will keep you laughing even when you've seen it more than once.  The characters are so dynamic, it was even better than the book! I loved it. I highly recommend getting the DVD and sharing it with someone that could use some good laughs.

This was definitely a great play. My friend's enjoyed the play from beginning to end. The characters and their issues were surreal. The plot was easy to follow and the story stayed connected throughout the entire play. Can't wait to see more of the author's work. I have the book as well.
